meanings.definition: A person, plant, or animal that is descended from a particular ancestor.
meanings.sent1: My ancestors had many descendants who now live all over the world.
meanings.sent2: The descendants of the ancient civilization still honor their traditions.
meanings.sent3: The little squirrel proudly showed off its descendants to the other forest animals.
meanings.sent4: The family tree branches out with each new generation of descendants.
meanings.sent5: The descendants of the famous explorer continue his legacy of adventure.

meanings.sent1: The mama bird watched over her chirping descendants in the nest.
meanings.sent2: The farmer was proud of his healthy pig descendants.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous puppy played with its fluffy descendants in the yard.
meanings.sent4: The apple tree's sweet fruit are the descendants of its blossoms.
meanings.sent5: The queen bee's descendants buzzed busily around the hive.
